text: Borislav Georgiev (; born 17 July 1974) is a former Bulgarian footballer. In his career he played as a defender and defensive midfielder. Georgiev played for Sachsen Leipzig in Germany and for Kallithea F.C. and Levadiakos F.C. in the Greek Super League. In August 2011, he joined Etar 1924. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian footballers Category:Bulgarian expatriate footballers Category:PFC Spartak Varna players Category:FC Sachsen Leipzig players Category:FC Lokomotiv 1929 Sofia players Category:Levadiakos F.C. players Category:Kallithea F.C. players Category:PFC Slavia Sofia players Category:FC Etar 1924 Veliko Tarnovo players Category:First Professional Football League (Bulgaria) players Category:Super League Greece players Category:Expatriate footballers in Germany Category:Expatriate footballers in Greece Category:Bulgarian expatriate sportspeople in Greece Category:Association football defenders
title: Borislav Georgiev
